mapper.insert: insert into t_user( username, password, email, phone, gender, avadar, salt, member, birthday, contact_way, signature, gold, is_delete, status, create_user, create_time, modified_user, modified_time )values( #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{avadar}, #{salt}, #{member}, #{birthday}, #{contactWay}, #{signature}, #{gold}, #{isDelete}, #{status}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime})
mapper.select: select id, username, password, nickname, email, address, phone, gender, avadar, salt, t.member, birthday, contact_way contactWay, signature, gold, is_delete isDelete, status from t_user t where username=#{username};
select id, username, nickname, password, email, phone, gender, address, avadar, salt, member, birthday, contact_way contactWay, signature, gold, is_delete isDelete, status from t_user where id=#{id}
